http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#lab.value: 中国人民武装警察部队第一八七师

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.value: The 187th Division (Chinese: 第187师) was created in January 1949 under the Regulation of the Redesignations of All Organizations and Units of the Army, issued by Central Military Commission on November 1, 1948, basing on the 7th Brigade, 3rd Column of the Jinchaji Military Region. Its history can be traced to 2nd Detachment of Jizhong Column, formed in September 1945. The division was part of 63rd Corps. Under the flag of 188th division it took part in several major battles in the Chinese Civil War. From January 14, 1976 to November 1982, the division maintained as a northern unit, catalogue B.
武装警察第187師団（武警第187师）は、中国人民武装警察部隊の師団の1つ。

http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract.value: 武装警察第187師団（武警第187师）は、中国人民武装警察部隊の師団の1つ。
